Trait.name: Charisma
Trait.description: Charisma is the capacity to effect others intellectually and emotionally.

Trait.name: Grit
Trait.description: Grit is both physical and mental constitution against stress, as well as self-control

Trait.name: Creativity
Trait.description: Creativity is problem solving, inventing, drawing connections, and logic

Trait.name: Muscle
Trait.description: Muscle is the raw physical power that can be applied

Trait.name: Hide
Trait.description: Hide is one's ability to disguise oneself in the environment to avoid being sensed

Trait.name: Seek
Trait.description: Seek is the active pursuit of finding something or someone, noteably using sight

Trait.name: Scamper
Trait.description: Scamper is one's dexterity, reflexes, and movement control

Trait.name: Scrap
Trait.description: Scrap is melee combat, either armed or unarmed, in regards of skill to hit and to damage

Trait.name: Throw
Trait.description: Throw is ranged combat, throwing objects, in regards to skill to hit and damage

Trait.name: Sense
Trait.description: Sense is one's multiple senses, most noteably for passive use, i.e. sight, hearing, smelling, tasting, touching, balance, etc.

Trait.name: Communication
Trait.description: Intimidation, Language, reading, writing, negotiation, etiquette, seduction

Trait.name: Humanities: Theology
Trait.description: Religions, gods, deities, spirits, rituals, customs

Trait.name: Humanities: Occult
Trait.description: Forbidden, obscure, rare or taboo rituals, practices, and groups

Trait.name: Locale: Survival
Trait.description: Finding food, making shelters, making fire, identifying safe versus dangerous elements

Trait.name: Locale: Tracking
Trait.description: Finding a person or creature by their physical trail left behind

Trait.name: Machinery: Drive
Trait.description: Operate and steer ground machines that move via wheels or treads

Trait.name: Machinery: Engineering
Trait.description: Identify, repair, fix, invent, build, disassemble mechanical devices

Trait.name: Perform: Dance
Trait.description: Formal, ballroom, belly, tribal, ritualistic, seductive

Trait.name: Social Sciences: Criminology
Trait.description: Studying crime, investigations, criminal psychology, forensics

Trait.name: Social Sciences: Archaeology
Trait.description: Study of cultures and people from the past through the physical evidence left behind

Trait.name: Social Sciences: Psychology
Trait.description: Study of individual behavior, motivations, and the ego

Trait.name: Social Sciences: Sociology
Trait.description: Study of social behaviour, including its origins, development, organization, and institutions such as social norms

Trait.name: Magic: Vagrant
Trait.description: Dark Ether Magic: Obscuring, MisKnowing, Illusion, Simulacrum, Unknowing
